description: Try our easy to follow Easy Carbonara with Spaghetti recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Carbonara with Spaghetti Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the pasta and reserve 1/4 cup cooking liquid. Add pasta to the pan with the speck. Toss to coat. Take off the heat. Then add the egg and cheese mixture and reserved cooking liquid. Toss to coat the pasta, season with freshly ground black pepper. Serve immediately with a green salad to the side. Tip 1: For gluten, dairy free version swap the spaghetti for 4 zucchinis, thinly sliced into long matchsticks and oil for coconut oil, parmesan for cashew nut cheese finishing with a little lemon zest. Tip 2: You can substitute the spaghetti for any other long pasta such as fettuccine or long macaroni. Tip 3: Swap speck with pre chopped bacon from the deli counter.
